nodes.text: The Mar'eyce, Mando'a for "discovery", was a starship used by Pulsipher.

He and his Taris survey team used the Mar'eyce to travel from Taris to Jebble after discovering the Muur Talisman in 3963 BBY. Celeste Morne, Zayne Carrick and Marn Hierogryph stowed away on the vessel during this journey.
